title: Fix Ocerina server please.....

embed.description: Create & discover new Champion builds/strategies, check your Summoner statistics and try our powerful LoL charts.

body:
My normal ping is **333-330**....  Now 350-380.... Losing 3 game in a row for no reason.... Last game we had first blood and + 2 extra kill and my ping up to 400... Like can't move talking and all... i restarted my comp + internet ON THE GAME cuz can't do much, and now we lost the game.... Where was no tank & team work.
**Thanks riot for losing 40lp for ping love it u guys! :)**

replies.body: Get NBN it's faster than what you will need
So what your saying is its riots fault you are having latency issues because you changed to a server that is further away from you..... legit?
Really don't know Riot what thinking.... Make Transfer to free make people Big mistakes and u see u have high lagg there and try transfer back like 2600rp... Lol. How to make easy money...

Because everyone should already know by then, that ping is directly related to physical distances. That was 2013 we're talking about bud.

Free Transfer was there because OCE server was only made until then, we were originally on different servers, some on KR, some on Garena and most of us were on NA. Some on EU too.

So the transfer was free and we got to experience what others had since day 1, it was a holy day.

It's not Riot's fault but yours I am sorry.

lol no me only have this problem hehe
http://forums.oce.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=39744

You can try submitting a [Support Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and hopefully they might do a free transfer for you but I doubt it will be likely.

There is only one way to solve your high ping issue forever, that is to transfer back sadly.

Where are you playing from?

330 ms ping average/normal? Are you playing from space or something?

It's most likely either your comp, your Isp or maybe just maybe Riot's server. But I don't think any server issue is going on atm.

There is too much routing between your comp and the server, you might wanna check out why if you are actually playing in OCE physically.

I from Eu North. I Clicked to free transfer to ocerina.. Was don't know how it work... like 4 mount ago. I playing always 333 ping ~ but now kinda suck for me... I know.. WHy not transfer back? Reason is easy... I don't waste money for rp...

You really should, considering the physical distance between you and our server. You prob start with a base of 250+ ms ping.

And all the things that happen (from weather to failure/maintenance etc) to everything in between you and the server will directly affect your ping, increaseing it. And the routing between countries isn't always optimal so you get another few extra pings.

So yeah kinda makes sense you have high base pings and high fluctuation range.

Really, just get the RP and transfer back to your region server. It's only like 20 bucks (maybe 3 hours of work max), and saves you so much trouble.

Don't play on servers that is too far to where you physically live and play from, even if the transfer is free. That was for OCE players when the server was set up for us, before then we were all playing on other servers, mainly on NA. Distance puts a big toll on the latency.
